title: Relative Clauses 3
description: Add the phrase in brackets to the sentence using a relative clause. If it's possible, you should drop the relative pronoun:

parts.value: I broke the plate (the plate was a wedding present)

parts.answer: I broke the plate that was a wedding present
answerList: I broke the plate that was a wedding present
I broke the plate which was a wedding present

parts.value: The police arrested the man (I saw the man steal a handbag)

parts.answer: The police arrested the man I saw steal a handbag
answerList: The police arrested the man I saw steal a handbag

parts.value: The Queen fired the chef (we had met the chef)

parts.answer: The Queen fired the chef we had met
answerList: The Queen fired the chef we had met

parts.value: She wrote to her friend (her friend lives in Vietnam)

parts.answer: She wrote to her friend that lives in Vietnam
answerList: She wrote to her friend that lives in Vietnam
She wrote to her friend who lives in Vietnam

parts.value: Jill ate the sandwich (the sandwich had tomato and cheese inside)

parts.answer: Jill ate the sandwich that had tomato and cheese inside
answerList: Jill ate the sandwich that had tomato and cheese inside
Jill ate the sandwich which had tomato and cheese inside

parts.value: His friend lives in Scotland (his friend is a lawyer)

parts.answer: His friend that is a lawyer lives in Scotland
answerList: His friend that is a lawyer lives in Scotland
His friend who  is a lawyer lives in Scotland

parts.value: We called the secretary (I went to school with the secretary)

parts.answer: We called the secretary I went to school with
answerList: We called the secretary I went to school with

parts.value: The CD is in my bag (the CD has Spanish music)

parts.answer: The CD that has Spanish music is in my bag
answerList: The CD that has Spanish music is in my bag
The CD which has Spanish music is in my bag

parts.value: The book is very interesting (the book is about Japanese culture)

parts.answer: The book that is about Japanese culture is very interesting
answerList: The book that is about Japanese culture is very interesting
The book which is about Japanese culture is very interesting

parts.value: The bag was stolen (I bought the bag yesterday)

parts.answer: The bag I bought yesterday was stolen
answerList: The bag I bought yesterday was stolen

parts.value: He likes films (the films come from Asia)

parts.answer: He likes films that come from Asia
answerList: He likes films that come from Asia
He likes films which come from Asia

parts.value: My nephew broke the plate (I received the plate as a present)

parts.answer: My nephew broke the plate I received as a present
answerList: My nephew broke the plate I received as a present

parts.value: The chocolate was very old (we bought the chocolate last week)

parts.answer: The chocolate we bought last week was very old
answerList: The chocolate we bought last week was very old

parts.value: The TV programme was very funny (Lucy recommended the TV programme)

parts.answer: The TV programme Lucy recommended was very funny
answerList: The TV programme Lucy recommended was very funny

parts.value: The girl is on TV tonight (I met the girl yesterday)

parts.answer: The girl I met yesterday is on TV tonight
answerList: The girl I met yesterday is on TV tonight

parts.value: They found the money (I dropped the money)

parts.answer: They found the money I dropped
answerList: They found the money I dropped
